section.para: A collapsible vertical menu. The color scheme is based on skin parameters, but might differ from a skin basing on the values of the "backgpoundType" and "backgroundTypeTopLevel" attributes. The component can include two types of child components: panelMenuNode and PanelMenuItem.

itemizedlist.listitem: 3D look and feel with easily customizable depth and borders
Multi-level tree-like menu based on nodes and items
Bulleting templates including custom icons attached to any side
